mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dailySummary (date, pageviews, visitors, orders, revenue, signups, inquiries, reviews, regDate) VALUES (#{date}, #{pageviews}, #{visitors}, #{orders}, #{revenue}, #{signups}, #{inquiries}, #{reviews}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dailySummary WHERE STR_TO_DATE(date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY AND CURDATE() order by date desc ;

SELECT SUM(orders) AS weekOrders, SUM(revenue) AS weekRevenue, SUM(visitors) AS weekVisitors, SUM(signups) AS weekSignups, SUM(inquiries) AS weekInquiries, SUM(reviews) AS weekReviews FROM dailySummary WHERE STR_TO_DATE(date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY AND CURDATE();

SELECT SUM(orders) AS monthOrders, SUM(revenue) AS monthRevenue, SUM(visitors) AS monthVisitors, SUM(signups) AS monthSignups, SUM(inquiries) AS monthInquires, SUM(reviews) AS monthReviews FROM dailySummary WHERE YEAR(STR_TO_DATE(date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(STR_TO_DATE(date, '%Y-%m-%d')) = MONTH(CURDATE());
